title: Ghost To Ghost Halloween Special - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/31/17
itunes:title: Ghost To Ghost Halloween Special - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/31/17
description:
George Noory celebrates Halloween with the annual Ghost To Ghost show. George shares a ghost story he heard many years ago in St. Louis. Andrew from Michigan calls in with a story about seeing a car being driven by a girl who had been dead for two months. Producer Tom Danheiser shares a twitter question from a listener. Find out if George and Tom fear death.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
